mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review ( rev_us_num, rev_rt_num, rev_content, rev_created, rev_updated, rev_state, rev_visit, rev_visitor ) VALUES ( #{rev_us_num}, #{rev_rt_num}, #{rev_content}, now(), now(), 0, #{rev_visit}, #{rev_visitor} )
INSERT INTO reviewscore ( rs_rev_num, rs_st_num, rs_score ) VALUES ( #{rs_rev_num}, #{rs_st_num}, #{rs_score} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM review LEFT JOIN revres USING (rev_num) LEFT JOIN reservation USING (res_num) WHERE res_num = #{res_num}

SELECT r.rev_num, r.rev_us_num, r.rev_rt_num, r.rev_content, r.rev_created, r.rev_updated, r.rev_state, r.rev_visit, r.rev_visitor, u.us_name, rt.rt_name,
rs.rs_num, rs.rs_rev_num, rs.rs_st_num, rs.rs_score, st.st_num, st.st_category,
f.file_num, f.file_path, f.file_name, f.file_type, f.file_foreign, f.file_tag, f.file_res_num
FROM review r LEFT JOIN user u ON r.rev_us_num = u.us_num LEFT JOIN restaurant rt ON r.rev_rt_num = rt.rt_num LEFT JOIN reviewscore rs ON r.rev_num = rs.rs_rev_num LEFT JOIN scoretype st ON rs.rs_st_num = st.st_num LEFT JOIN file f ON r.rev_num = f.file_foreign AND f.file_type = 'REVIEW'
WHERE r.rev_num = #{rev_num}
